mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_station_day_input x, Station y where x.station_id = y.station_id
mapper.update: INSERT INTO t_station_day_input(order_id, station_id, payer_id, time, type, Pname, pay_money, counter_Fee, real_input, balance, transaction_type, has_invoice, person_in_charge) VALUES (#{order_id}, #{station_id}, #{payer_id}, #{time}, #{type}, #{Pname}, #{pay_money}, #{counter_Fee}, #{real_input}, #{balance}, #{transaction_type}, #{has_invoice}, #{person_in_charge});
